headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Broadcom, Philip Morris International and Novo Nordisk
summary: Broadcom rides AI growth and VMware integration, Philip Morris pushes smoke-free transition, while Novo Nordisk grapples with Wegovy knockoffs and intense competition.
